post:
**Pulsed Media Managed Dediseedbox(MDS)**

We got some good capacity dedicated seedbox for offer, and you can turn these to full dedicated server as well with a small fee. RAID0 default, all like on our shared seedboxes and ready to go in seconds. rTorrent/rutorrent, rclone, sftp, https, syncthing, resilio, ffmpeg etc etc. included. You can also setup plex to these freely as they are dedicated servers just for you.

These are located in our Helsinki, Finland datacenter.


The Offers Are

 * F19-MDS-12TB: 4x3TB RAID0, Opteron 6core, 24GB ECC RAM. [39.99€/Month](http://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=223)
 * F19-MDS-XEON-12TB: 4x3TB RAID0, Xeon 4core, 36GB ECC RAM. [44.99€/Month](http://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=226)
 * F19-MDS-32TB: 4x8TB RAID0, Opteron 6core, 24GB ECC RAM. [69.99€/Month](http://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=224)

 
Full specs and details: https://pulsedmedia.com/managed-dediseedbox.php


Included are:

 * rTorrent / ruTorrent
 * Public trackers allowed
 * HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, LFTP, SSH access
 * OpenVPN
 * autodl-irssi, sonarr, pyload, flexget, rclone, resilio, syncthing, btsync (1.4 and 2.2), ffmpeg, fuse (unionfs, sshfs, s3fs etc.) etc.
 * [Very Strong Privacy Policy](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Privacy_Policy)
 * [14-day full moneyback guarantee](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Refunds_Policy)
 * [Standard seedbox Service Level Agreement(SLA)](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Seedbox_SLA_Policy)
 * **Setup is INSTANT**


Extra info:

 * [Green Datacenter operations](http://blog.pulsedmedia.com/2017/04/steady-progress-green-operations/)
 * Uncongested network with switches optimized for high throughput applications
 * Some latency metrics: 20ms DECIX, 36ms OVH, 38ms Online, 0.4-0.6ms Cloudflare, 31ms Leaseweb, 36ms Redstation (UK), 23ms Hetzner, 23ms Serverloft aka Plusserver (DE, +many other brands). If you want something added, please comment below
 * Datacenter Location: Helsinki, Finland
 * Registered company in Finland
 * [Terms Of Service](http://pulsedmedia.com/terms%20and%20conditions.pdf)


*Payment methods*

 * Paypal
 * IBAN/SEPA Wiretransfers
 * Crypto (BTC, LTC, XMR, ETH, DOGE and many others. BTC, XMR with small discount!)
